code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SynonymsButton=function SynonymsButton(props){var datamuseRequest=props.datamuseRequest,inputWords=props.inputWords,generateWords=props.generateWords,setOutputWord=props.setOutputWord;function getDatamuseSimilarToUrl(ml){return"https://api.datamuse.com/words?".concat(new URLSearchParams({'ml':inputWords}).toString());};function showSynonyms(output){console.log(output);var wordToShow=[];if(output.length!==0){wordToShow.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Words with a similar meaning to ",inputWords,": "]},"titleSyn"));wordToShow.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:generateWords(output)},'ul'));}else{wordToShow.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"no result"}));}setOutputWord(wordToShow);};var synonyms=function synonyms(){datamuseRequest(getDatamuseSimilarToUrl(inputWords),showSynonyms);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:synonyms,type:"button",className:"btn btn-secondary",children:"Show synonyms"});};export default SynonymsButton;
